question: Which of the following Kings helped Pallava King Nandivarmana to regain Kanchi from the Chalukyas?
explanation: The name ‘Dantidurga’ meant he whose elephant is his fortress which also signifies the military feats and accomplishments of Dantidurga. He also helped his father-in-law, the Pallava King Nandivarmana, to regain Kanchi from the Chalukyas.
